00117 /* Undo opcodes */
00118 
00119 /* Simple main cursor movement */
00120 #define UNDO_CLEFT      001
00121 #define UNDO_CRIGHT     002
00122 #define UNDO_CUP        003
00123 #define UNDO_CDOWN      004
00124 
00125 /* Simple selection cursor movement */
00126 #define UNDO_SLEFT      005
00127 #define UNDO_SRIGHT     006
00128 #define UNDO_SUP        007
00129 #define UNDO_SDOWN      010
00130 
00131 /* Complex movement (opcode is followed
00132  * by 4 character line ID + a 2 character
00133  * position ID and opcode (repeat)) */
00134 #define UNDO_CTO        011
00135 #define UNDO_STO        012
00136 
00137 /* Complex editing */
00138 /* 1 - opcode is followed by 1 byte for ascii character and opcode (repeat)) */
00139 /* 2 - opcode is followed by 2 bytes for utf-8 character and opcode (repeat)) */
00140 /* 3 - opcode is followed by 3 bytes for utf-8 character and opcode (repeat)) */
00141 /* 4 - opcode is followed by 4 bytes for unicode character and opcode (repeat)) */
00142 #define UNDO_INSERT_1   013
00143 #define UNDO_INSERT_2   014
00144 #define UNDO_INSERT_3   015
00145 #define UNDO_INSERT_4   016
00146 
00147 #define UNDO_BS_1       017
00148 #define UNDO_BS_2       020
00149 #define UNDO_BS_3       021
00150 #define UNDO_BS_4       022
00151 
00152 #define UNDO_DEL_1      023
00153 #define UNDO_DEL_2      024
00154 #define UNDO_DEL_3      025
00155 #define UNDO_DEL_4      026
00156 
00157 /* Text block (opcode is followed
00158  * by 4 character length ID + the text
00159  * block itself + the 4 character length
00160  * ID (repeat) and opcode (repeat)) */
00161 #define UNDO_DBLOCK     027 /* Delete block */
00162 #define UNDO_IBLOCK     030 /* Insert block */
00163 
00164 /* Misc */
00165 #define UNDO_SWAP       031 /* Swap cursors */
00166 
00167 #define UNDO_INDENT     032
00168 #define UNDO_UNINDENT   033
00169 #define UNDO_COMMENT    034
00170 #define UNDO_UNCOMMENT  035
00171 
00172 /* Marker flags */
00173 #define TMARK_TEMP      0x01    /* Remove on non-editing events, don't save */
00174 #define TMARK_EDITALL   0x02    /* Edit all markers of the same group as one */
